DOC.brief_summary: A tailored Internet-based cognitive-behavioural intervention test within primary care clinic . Weekly measure symptom depression anxiety obtain . Significant within-group effect expect .
DOC.brief_title: Tailored Internet-delivered Cognitive Behaviour Therapy Primary Care
DOC.detailed_description: This Internet-based cognitive-behavioural therapy intervention contain 8-10 text-based self-help module 4 module fix ( first three last ) rest `` prescribe '' follow diagnostic interview . These module contain material panic disorder , social phobia , stress management , assertiveness training , concentration , relaxation among thing . The intervention test within primary care clinic . Weekly measure symptom depression anxiety obtain .
DOC.criteria: Symptoms depression anxiety Severe depression ( base interview ) Severe psychiatric condition ( e.g . psychosis bipolar disorder ) Suicidal ( measure diagnostic interview )
